channel.title: LCallDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from LCallDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump Reveals Picks for Ambassadors to Portugal, Malta
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump on Tuesday announced nominations to be the U.S. ambassadors to Portugal and Malta.

item.title: Nebraska Gov. Pillen Hurt in Horseback Riding Accident
item.description: Nebraska Gov. Jim Pillen, a Republican, is recovering from serious injuries sustained in a horseback riding accident, CBS News reported.

item.title: Biden's Veto of Judgeship Bill Sparks Criticism

item.title: No White Christmas Here: Santa in the Amazon

It's official: Biden signs new law, designates bald eagle as 'national bird'
item.description: President Joe Biden signed a law Monday naming the bald eagle as the country's national bird.
